system.description: You know a cantrip from the following list: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.mocigztrqyoks506]{Mage Hand}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.uy8he1yquaiym6y8]{Prestidigitation}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.omvngnmoo75is54f]{Spare the Dying}, or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.eiek2vbzwijd0qac]{Thaumaturgy}. Your spellcasting ability score for this cantrip is Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (whichever is highest).
